attention_level.description: The level of attention required for this asset.

direction.description: The primary direction suggested by the chart analysis.

time_horizon.description: The expected time horizon for the setup to play out.

ai_direction_score.description: The model's directional conviction score, ranging from -100 (strong bearish) to 100 (strong bullish).

setup_purity_score.description: How cleanly the detected quant setup matches the ideal pattern (0-100). 0 if no active quant setups.

confidence.description: The model's confidence in its overall assessment, ranging from 0.0 (low) to 1.0 (high).

summary_text.description: A comprehensive 5-7 sentence technical analysis covering setup context, current structure, purity assessment, key thesis, and risk definition. Must be specific and quantitative with concrete numbers from the data.

why_now.description: 3-7 bullet points explaining the immediate technical catalysts, each citing concrete numbers from the input data.

invalidation.description: The price level that invalidates the current setup.

key_levels.description: Key price levels for the setup.

what_to_watch_next.description: 2-6 points on what to watch for confirmation or negation.

risks_and_contradictions.description: 2-6 points on risks and contradictory signals.

ai_adjusted_entry.description: AI-adjusted entry price (within ±10% of quant entry). Null if no adjustment recommended.

ai_adjusted_stop.description: AI-adjusted stop loss (within ±10% of quant stop). Null if no adjustment recommended.

ai_adjusted_target.description: AI-adjusted target price (within ±10% of quant target). Null if no adjustment recommended.
